contents.text: Tom meets Jenny at a party for the first time . Now they are introducing themselves to each other .
contents.text_zh: 汤姆和珍妮在聚会上初次见面，他们正互相做着自我介绍。

contents.text: Hi . I don’t think we’ve met . My name’s Tom .
contents.text_zh: 嗨，我们以前没见过吧！我叫汤姆。

contents.text: Hi , Tom . Nice to meet you.  My name is Juanita , but everybody calls me Jenny .
contents.text_zh: 你好，汤姆，很高兴见到你。我叫胡安妮塔，但大家都叫我珍妮。

contents.text: Nice to meet you , Jenny . So, where are you from ?
contents.text_zh: 很高兴见到你，珍妮。那么，你是哪里人呢？

contents.text: Well ,originally I’m from Argentina,  but we moved to the United States when I was about five years old . My parents now live in Chile . That’s where they first met . How about you ,Tom ?
contents.text_zh: 呃，我本来是阿根廷人，可我5岁的时候就搬到美国来了。我的父母现在住在智利，那是他们初次见面的地方。你呢，汤姆？

contents.text: I was born in Fresno . California,  and we lived there until I was seven .Then since my father worked for the military . we moved all over the place .
contents.text_zh: 我出生在加州的弗雷斯诺，我们在那住了7年。后来，自从我爸爸到军队工作之后，我们就经常搬家。

contents.text: Oh yeah ? Where are some of the places you’ ve lived ?
contents.text_zh: 是吗？那你都去过哪些地方呢？

contents.text: Mostly, we were overseas . We spent a total of ten years in Korea.  Germany , and Japan . We were transferred back to the States three years ago , but I think my parents would have liked to live overseas for at least 20 more years .
contents.text_zh: 我们大部分时间都在国外。我们在韩国、德国和日本住了10年，3年前我们才搬回美国，不过我想我爸妈可能会在国外至少住20年。

contents.text: Wow . It sounds like you’ve had an interesting life .So , what do you do now ?
contents.text_zh: 哇，听起来你的生活应该挺丰富多彩的吧！那你现在在做什么呢？

contents.text: I’m a student at Yale University.
contents.text_zh: 我现在是耶鲁大学的学生。

contents.text: Oh really ? What are you studying ?
I’m majoring in philosophy.  How about you ?What do you do ?
contents.text_zh: 我的专业是哲学，你呢？你是干什么工作的呢？

contents.text: Well, I’m working as a sales representative for VegSemiconductor downtown .
contents.text_zh: 呃，我在市区维佳半导体公司做销售代表。

contents.text: No kidding ! My brother works there too .
contents.text_zh: 你没开玩笑吧！我哥哥也在那儿工作。
